name: UControlRigEditModeSettings
doc: Settings object used to show useful information in the details panel

bDisplayHierarchy: Whether to show all bones in the hierarchy
bDisplayNulls: Whether to show all nulls in the hierarchy
bDisplaySockets: Should we show sockets in the viewport
bHideControlShapes: Should we always hide control shapes in viewport
bShowAllProxyControls: Should we always hide control shapes in viewport
bShowControlsAsOverlay: Determins if controls should be rendered on top of other controls
DrivenControlColor: Indicates a control being driven by a proxy control
bDisplayAxesOnSelection: Should we show axes for the selected elements
AxisScale: The scale for axes to draw on the selection
bCoordSystemPerWidgetMode: If true we restore the coordinate space when changing Widget Modes in the Viewport
bOnlySelectRigControls: If true we can only select Rig Controls in the scene not other Actors.
bLocalTransformsInEachLocalSpace: If true when we transform multiple selected objects in the viewport they each transforms along their own local transform space
